website_summaries.verdict: One can hardly find any bad thing to say about the Under Armour Harper 4 Mid RM baseball cleat. The pair is packed with the essentials for any decent baseball shoe. The pair covers comfort, fit, and style. This Harper shoe has also been reported to bring good value for money. If you’re one looking for a surefire performer on the field, this pair is one to look at.
pros: The Under Armour Harper 4 Mid RM has a great look according to the majority of its reviewers
A significant chunk of commenters says that this baseball cleat is comfortable to wear
A handful of users indicate that this Under Armour baseball shoe has a great fit
Several shoppers share that this Harper baseball shoe is really worth it
A few players say that this mid-cut baseball cleat provides great ankle support
One of the users of this boot states that this metal shoe is lightweight
cons: There have not been enough reviews found for this section

customer_reviews.title: Great cleat
customer_reviews.text: Apparently I am the best mom ever as my 13 y/o informs me that that these shoes are lit as well as comfortable. Guessing lit is a good thing 😆
customer_reviews.author: Family of 4

customer_reviews.title: Great basic cleat for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe for price. Nothing fancy about these, just a basic cleat. My son likes that these hit above ankle for a little more support when running on uneven surfaces. We bought both black and blue. He wanted blue but the link he texted me came over as black so that’s what I ordered. Ended up ordering blue too but those went back because the blue didn’t match his school blue and he didn’t get the coach’s approval . Not UA’s fault so no stars off for that.
customer_reviews.author: A. Wooldridge

customer_reviews.title: Swap the laces!!!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing feel. Very comfortable. Flashy when clean. You might want to swap out the laces. The factory thin and garbage. My broke fast.
customer_reviews.author: k

customer_reviews.title: Nice Shoes
customer_reviews.text: For the price of these, they are very nice! These are much cheaper than our local big box stores so that sort of freaked me out thinking I was going to get a knockoff but they look real to me! Unfortunately because of good ole Covid-19 and schools being cancelled for the entire year :( my son will never get to wear them on the field. He 'graduates' this year so it's very sad that everything he was looking forward to has come to an abrupt end. But these shoes are nice and he matched is shoe size (in the USA) and they fit exactly as we expected.
customer_reviews.author: Tina

customer_reviews.title: Durable and cleans up well (as well as white can)
customer_reviews.text: My son's feet are growing exponentially and I was looking for a baseball cleat that would fit him nicely but also give him room to grow during the season. This shoe is big enough but because it has the higher top and the velcro helps keep his feet in place. I was wary of getting white but it does clean up pretty well. Some of the material does not want to clean off as well as I had hoped with a rag which is why I wouldn't give it 5, but definitely a high quality shoe and would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Schneiderstrong

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: My son loved his shoes. Amazon said they would be here on Monday the 23rd by 8 p.m. nothing showed! So I had to tell my son when I went to open gifts with him I had something but it didnt show up like it said. So I looked into why and ups said Tuesday by end of day. Not sure why different but otherwise showed up and he was happy.
customer_reviews.author: andrew dollen

customer_reviews.title: Great quality & very comfy!
customer_reviews.text: I got these for my 11 year old. He's 4'11, 85 pounds. He is very particular about stuff sometimes so I was nervous about buying these without trying them on him first. But we bought his normal size, they fit him perfectly, and he never complained about them hurting his feet "to break them in".
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: Quality is lacking. 1. These are ridiculously small. I ordered a size bigger and still small. Made for dudes with chicken legs.2. I tried to pull the laces tight, because you don’t play sports with loosely tied cleats, one of the cheap little cloth straps broke.dont waist your money
customer_reviews.author: Mike Gamble

customer_reviews.title: Have good Faith
customer_reviews.text: Thanks my son really like his shoes. Thanks God bless
customer_reviews.author: Rolanda Wright

customer_reviews.title: Your kids deserve these. Run faster.
customer_reviews.text: My son is 11. Does anyone remember getting new shoes and being able to run faster. Asking your friends and having them agree. Ever do that as an adult....no!!! Buy your kids these shoes, let them run faster.
customer_reviews.author: JARED

customer_reviews.title: A little narrow on the size
customer_reviews.text: The shoes were too narrow for my average size feet. Returning the shoes through Amazon couldn't be better. Free return shipping and you don't even have to wrap or package the returning item.
customer_reviews.author: Repus

customer_reviews.title: Fits perfect
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking cleats but gets dirty because of being white! I'm not sure how long they will last i will update at the end of the season.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: To Be Continued...
customer_reviews.text: We are still in the "wearing them in" stage due to just having practices only. That's why I gave it 3 stars. I was very happy to have found these in my 13 year olds size...14 in mens! He has Pronation so ankle support is a must have.
customer_reviews.author: B Elliott

customer_reviews.title: Beat My Expectations
customer_reviews.text: The ankle support on these was much better than I was anticipating. I couldn't roll an ankle with these on if I tried. Broke in easily after one softball game as well. Nice, well made show. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey Young

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been needing new cleats for a while. These look and feel great! Can’t wait to put them to use Tuesday night.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit
customer_reviews.text: Their sizing chart is accurate for perfect fit! Good quality and comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: joe wise

customer_reviews.title: Very good
customer_reviews.text: Unexpectedly fit, very fit after wearing, feel 100 meters sprint can improve the performance
customer_reviews.author: Kendell  Pitts

customer_reviews.title: The right size
customer_reviews.text: I LUV tht shoe & I'll be using them to play softball this summer.
customer_reviews.author: Larry Pittman

customer_reviews.title: Love the Harper 4
customer_reviews.text: Love the height of the cleats and will work perfect for me in softball
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

customer_reviews.title: True to size very comfy
customer_reviews.text: Love these for paint ball comfy and lots of grip
customer_reviews.author: Ronald C.

product_meta.title: Under Armour mens 3022061 Harper 4 Mid Rm
product_meta.description: The Under Armour® Harper 4 Mid RM Baseball cleats are all business and ready to do some damage on the diamond. Let's play. Synthetic leather upper provides premium support and durability. Mesh tongue for added breathability to keep feet cool and dry. Adjustable laces and hook-and-loop strap closure. Full-length EVA midsole helps disperse cleat pressure and provides cushioning. Rubber molded cleats provide optimal traction for all field surfaces. Imported. Measurements: Weight: 14 oz Product measurements were taken using size 11, width D - Medium. Please note that measurements may vary by size. Weight of footwear is based on a single item, not a pair.
feature_bullets: Synthetic upper is lightweight & durable with 3D print for added abrasion
Adjustable ankle strap locks you in with powerful stability & support
Full-length EVA midsole helps disperse cleat pressure & provides ideal comfort & cushioning
Rubber molded cleats provide optimal traction & durability for all field surfaces
Bryce Harper logo & signature details throughout
